about.security-banner: Para ser listado aqui, encontre e relate importantes vulnerabilidades de segurança

audit.wrong-account: Por favor, faça login na sua conta {username} para continuar em {website}
audit.sso-out-error: Ocorreu um erro ao entrar em {website}. Tente recarregar a página ou tente fazer outro login desta página!

audit-log.report: This wasn't me - report suspicious event

authenticator.hint: Do you want to speed up your next login? Give this device a name and add it to your account.
authenticator.choose-type-title: Choose the type of authenticator you want to add
authenticator.label: Label
authenticator.label-title: Enter a name for this authenticator
authenticator.submit-title: Fill out details and click here to add an authenticator

change-password.fill-token: Enter the full confirmation token that you received via email

login.fill-email: Please provide a valid email address

register.toc-agree-label: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
register.fill-toc: You need to agree to use this service
register.success: If the email address you entered is not already registered, please check your email inbox for a confirmation link!
register.400: Your password was not sufficiently secure or you are resetting from a different network than you requested it from.

reset-password.error: An error occured - please try again later!
reset-password.success: If the email address you entered is known, please check your email inbox for a password reset link!

confirm.success: Please check your email inbox for an authentication link. You can close this window now.
